doc.name: loadedTime
doc.summary: Specifies the time of a sound/movie, up to which the sound/movie can be played.

examples.example: put trunc(the loadedTime of me / the duration of me * 100) into tPercentLoaded

doc.description:
Use the loadedTime property to find out up to which time a movie or sound can be played.
Value:
The loadedTime of a player is an integer.
This property is read-only and cannot be set.
This property is used only for remote multimedia files. For local multimedia files, the value of this property is 0.
